metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20201 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in spice in versions before 0.14.92. A DoS tool might makeit easier for remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPUconsumption) by performing many renegotiations within a single connection.

criterions.comment: spice-gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
spice package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
